ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes there is no question that in a tank heavy group without an enchanter a bard is probably the most valuable asset they can acquire.  I just need to find some
ygData.messageBody:
Yes there is no question that in a tank heavy group without an enchanter a
bard is probably the most valuable asset they can acquire. I just need to
find some more tanks to group with. ;-)

Kit

It has happened to me in Firiona Vie, but yes it was after 32. I don't mean
to gainsaying all your points, but I just keep grouping with tanks who
freely offer "ahhh, I love bards" after the first battle. I have a tank (not

Tszaaz
